titles.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of "Countering International Parental Child Abduction Month" and expressing the sense of the Senate that Congress should raise awareness of the harm caused by international parental child abduction.

A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of "Countering International Parental Child Abduction Month" and expressing the sense of the Senate that Congress should raise awareness of the harm caused by international parental child abduction.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution states that the Senate recognizes and observes Countering International Parental Child Abduction Month in April 2024. It also urges the United States to continue to lead in raising awareness about the devastating impact of international parental child abduction.
